ygData.subject: RE: My thoughts
ygData.msgSnippet: I was at some wedding on Fen Ro a few weeks ago and one of the GMs there was a gnome (Can t recall name now)  At the end the gnome was casting some awesome
ygData.messageBody:
I was at some wedding on Fen Ro a few weeks ago and one of the GMs there was
a gnome (Can't recall name now) At the end the gnome was casting some
awesome spells that made the whole area light up with amazing techno colors.
I didn't think to ask then if they were fireworks, tho. But it was the most
amazing light show I've seen on EQ. I wonder if they were infact the
gnomish fireworks....?

Kilkin Cobblepot (Fennin Ro Gem Chopper)

-----Original Message-----
From: Catbik Tinkerton [mailto:catbik@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 25, 1999 12:03 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] My thoughts

From: "Catbik Tinkerton" <catbik@...>



>I think that fireworks were mentioned only as a marketing
ploy, and not
>actually put into the game. I hope someone dispels this
thought, because
>it
>would make my year to please others with free fireworks
shows.
